price: Observa cómo inventan mentiras y las atribuyen a Dios. Eso es en sí mismo un pecado evidente.
arabic: ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ يَفۡتَرُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَۖ وَكَفَىٰ بِهِۦٓ إِثۡمٗا مُّبِينًا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: unẓur kayfa yaftarūna ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba wakafā bihi ith'man mubīnan
